Web hosting and DDoS mitigation provider JavaPipe has launched a new unmetered VPS product line in Bucharest, Romania.

These brand new budget VPS offers feature unmetered 1Gbps bandwidth, high clock speeds per CPU core and either SSD storage or SATA storage for large files. They also come with 750Gbps DDoS protection that will mitigate any type of Distributed Denial of Service (DDoS) attack on all layers.

You can choose between managed and unmanaged plans. The fully managed plans come with the hosting control panel Vesta, advanced layer 7 DDoS protection, a Web Application Firewall (WAF) and free lifetime SSL certificates for all of your domains.

The operating system (OS) is not limited to just Linux, but Windows and FreeBSD are also available. This makes the unmetered VPS offers just perfect for game servers, streaming and high traffic sites that require extra bandwidth and security.
